title: Middle Eastern cabbage rolls with yoghurt sauce
ingredients: ['6 large cabbage leaves', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons chopped almonds', '2 tablespoons finely chopped sultanas', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped', '300g cooked rice', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '250ml chicken stock', 'Yoghurt sauce', '150g natural yoghurt', 'good pinch of allspice', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh mint (or 1 teaspoon dried)']
